newsitem.title: UK: Cabinet to be all Labour MPs-Blair government aide.
newsitem.headline: Cabinet to be all Labour MPs-Blair government aide.

text.p: Britain's new Prime Minister Tony Blair will appoint only members of his Labour Party to his new cabinet, a senior aide to his new government said on Friday.
"There will be no members of other parties in the list," the aide said.
There had been speculation that Blair might invite a member of the minority Liberal Democrats to join his governing team following comments he made about the need for more plural politics in Britain.

The Liberals scored a minor triumph in the election, increasing their seats in parliament to a post-war record of 45, but this was overshadowed by the massive electoral landslide which gave Labour 419 seats.
